author: coheigea
msg: Update to use latest Connector SNAPSHOT versions

author: elecharny
msg: o Fix the update of the presence index when deleting a value of an indexed AT (DIRSERVER-1799)

author: elecharny
msg: o Exposed the lockWrite() and unlockWrite() methods in OperationManager
o Protected the backend in the syncWorker thred, by using the OperationManager lock, otherwise we may have some concurrent modification in JDBM
o Flushed the JDBM journal in the sync() method, otherwise the *.db file remain empty.

author: pderop
msg: [FELIX-3910] added testcase which tries to reproduce the problem described in the FELIX-3910 jira issue.
For now, this test is incomplete because the paxexam version we are using is an old one and is using an old
felix framework, which does not fire a FrameworkEvent when it catches some exceptions fired by "service changed" listeners.

author: pderop
msg: Register a framework listener in order to track possible exceptions caught by the framework, when
